description: It is wonderful on nachos, crackers with cheese and for making chilly cheese toast.
A truly indulgent experience with sweet and rich red velvet cake on a creamy cheese flavoured base to give a burst of flavour in every bite!
Epic combination of signature pan crust, delicious chicken momos topped with spicy Schezwan sauce, Schezwan meatballs, onion, capsicum & 100% mozzarella
Sweet & juicy golden corn for that lipsmacking taste
Pepper barbecue chicken for that extra zing
Chicken malai tikka, herbed onion & green capsicum and red paprika
Chicken sausage, chicken pepperoni, sweet corn, black olive & jalapeno
A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping.
Hot bubbling gooey chocolate straight from heaven
